name: sunnily

in a happy and positive way: Earlier this year, he published his autobiography, sunnily titled "I'm Still An Optimist". She stopped and smiled sunnily at them: "Can you help me? I think I'm lost!"
More examplesFewer examplesElla lost her frown and smiled sunnily instead.John was sunnily good-humoured, and didn't complain or criticize anyone all day.The sunnily furnished "Old House at Home" restaurant offers quality food and a big outdoor dining area.Despite several setbacks, George was still sunnily confident of success.
